mapper.select: select m.id,m.password,m.name,m.tel,to_char(m.birth,'YYYY-MM-DD') as birth,m.sex,m.email,m.address,m.login_time, m.login_fail,m.point,m.signup_date,m.agreement,m.acc_status_no,a.acc_status_info from member m, (select * from acc_status) a where a.acc_status_no=m.acc_status_no and m.id=#{value}

select m.id,m.password,m.name,m.tel,to_char(m.birth,'YYYY-MM-DD') as birth,m.sex,m.email,m.address,m.login_time, m.login_fail,m.point,m.signup_date,m.agreement,m.acc_status_no,a.acc_status_info from member m, (select * from acc_status where acc_status_no=0) a where a.acc_status_no=m.acc_status_no and m.id=#{value}
select point from member where id=#{value}
select grade,id from grade where id=#{value}
mapper.update: update member set ACC_STATUS_NO=2 where id=#{value}
update member set LOGIN_TIME=SYSDATE,LOGIN_FAIL=0 where id=#{value}
update member set LOGIN_FAIL=LOGIN_FAIL+1 where id=#{value}
update member set point=#{point} where id=#{id}
UPDATE MEMBER SET ACC_STATUS_NO = #{accStatusNo} WHERE ID = #{id}
